attributes.action: Make the royal family pay tax, and stop taxes paying for their elegant lifestyle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The royal family is one of the wealthiest family in the world, however they do not pay tax, and they are kept in their wealth by tax payers. The money spent on their life style and all the ceremony surrounding the royal family, would be better spent on the failing NHS, education, and pensions schemes and the other failings this government is responsible for.
